mapper.select: SELECT lectureNum, memberEmail, categoryNum, lectureSubject, lectureContent, lecturePrice, FROM lecture WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO lecture(lectureNum, lectureEmail, categoryNum, lectureSubject, lectureContent, lecturePrice) VALUES(lecture_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{categoryNum}, #{lectureSubject}, #{lectureContent}, #{lecturePrice} )
